review: The doctor is really a superb one...the way he explained the problem and itz solution. The way he handled the patient is outstanding
Doctor answered all the questions and issues patiently. Prescribed medicines and suggested exercises as well.
reply_text: Thanks Amrapali for your feedback. Wish you speedy recovery

review: very friendly doctor and good explanation.wasn't hurrying up to finish consultation.will recommend others too

review: It was very wonderful experience. I had taken my Mother for treatment there first time. He helped a lot in understanding issues and solutions clearly. Thank you so much.
reply_text: Thanks for your positive feedback. Helps us in giving more to our patients. Team AODDC
